        public static void logError(java.lang.String error)
        method for other components to log custom error messages. This is to reduce coupling with EventLogger class
        Parameters:
        error - error message to log in EventLogger

      • closeStorages

        public void closeStorages()
        Close all storages. Run this before application closes.

      • setUpJUnitTestXmlWriter

        public void setUpJUnitTestXmlWriter()
        This method is provided for Components to set up a local test XML store. This is to aid testing, and it will ensure a fresh copy of storage everytime it runs without affecting the usual "local.xml" Method also updates the SessionStorage once JUnit Test XML is loaded
